00003 #include "RmExceptions.h"
00004 
00005 // Note: Doxygen doesn't like the RmExceptions:: qualifier, but the linker requires it
00006 std::ostream& RmExceptions::operator<<( std::ostream& os, const RmExceptions::Exception& e )
00007 {
00008         os      << (e.name == NULL ? "Exception" : e.name)
00009                 << " thrown in "
00010                 << (e.location == NULL ? "unspecified location" : e.location);
00011         if ( e.message != NULL ) os << "\n" << e.message << "\n";
00012 
00013         return os;
00014 }
